name: GOTFacts
0:
”Alexa open GOT facts”
”Alexa ask GOT facts to give me some information about GOT”
”Alexa ask GOT facts to tell me a GOT fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. o. t. facts
des: The name of the skill is GOT Facts. This is a Trivia based skill which provides the user with interesting and mind-blowing facts of Game of Thrones TV show. It gives random facts of characters, scenes etc.
